docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES. THE day had been soft and bright, the sort of glistening Saturday that fills the beaches and the tennis courts and the gardens of Southern California with ruthlessly robust, pleasure-pursuing multitudes. In midmorning, police were called to an isolated, expensive home on Cielo Drive, back in the wooded hills above Hollywood. What
